marketplace_tool.name: csv-merge
marketplace_tool.description:
Python script to merge contents of a CSV file following logic defined in given config.

Example from command line: 
		$ python csv-merge.py samples/csv-merge-confsample.py

Script Python pour combiner les donn√©es d'un fichier CSV sur la base de la configuration fournie.

Exemple de ligne de commande: 
		$ python csv-merge.py samples/csv-merge-confsample.py
